name: zither hero
description:
zither hero

a tiny game made in roughly 4 hours for the second AGDS MicroJam

imagine a world in which the guitar hero franchise didn't die

imagine a world where the nazis won world war 2

imagine what guitar hero would be like in that reality

probably nothing like this game actually but that's a cool concept someone should make

CONTROLS

Z X C V B N - big fret

, . ? - little fret

if you can play guitar hero you can play this game
